desc: I’m currently in the pre-production phase of a 14 minute short film for a new electronic music duo to be released early February. I can send you the song to reference the music if you’re interested. A possible visual reference is Daft Punk“Interstella 5555”/“Electroma” & 1980s sensibility (think Blade Runner, 80s era comics). Music is similar to Porter Robinson, Madeon, Phoenix, or Daft Punk.I've attached a tentative script/storyboard for the Intro track, along with photos of a) the actress that will be in the video and b) misc. references photos for the vibe.All work will be credited and highlighted. desc: DO NOT RESPOND UNLESS YOU ARE HIGHLY EXPERIENCED IN VIDEO EDITING WITH FINAL EDITABLE PRODUCT IN CAMTASIAWe are seeking bids on video editing (post) in Camtasia.We are creating several e-learning courses with a presenter (green screen) and Powerpoint, captured independently.  Each course consists of multiple chapters, 30-80 minutes in total length.  Each is recorded via 1080p video (MP4) separate from the PPT slides which are recorded in Camtasia's PPT add-in.We would like to hire a freelancer to:- merge the video and PPT slides (there are a series of back and forth slide changes at the beginning with 1-2-3 wording to make the alignment to the slides easy)- apply background sound reduction- remove the green screen from the presenter with proper adjustments- remove the presenter from a few slides where the presenter overlaps images- complete project in Camtasia so we may edit in future if necessary- save each lesson as independent MP4s (there are 3-7 per video, and denoted by an end/start title )A zip file in Camtasia format with media can be downloaded from the link below, and will be active approximately 2 hours after this post.[url removed, login to view]Please provide sample videos that you created - preferably for e-learning courses similar to ours, along with an estimate to perform the above functions on the attached video.  If you are bidding an hourly rate, please provide the number of hours for this video so we can understand total cost.  Please let me know of any questions.  Thank you.
title: Camtasia Video Learning Course Projects
